caption.p: The relationship between annual total phosphorus load and rainfall in three UK catchments. Annual total phosphorus (TP) load and rainfall are from one behavioural parameter set in the Hydrological Predictions for the Environment (HYPE) model, for years 5–30 from 100 runs of baseline conditions for a Newby catchment, Eden ( R 2 = 0.82, p < 0.01), b Blackwater catchment, Wensum ( R 2 = 0.61, p < 0.01) and c Wylye catchment, Avon ( R 2 = 0.63, p < 0.01). The dominant driver of annual P load is annual rainfall in all three of these diverse catchments
